This page tells you the terms of use on which you may make use of the website www.iconsultvet.co.uk (our Site), whether as a visitor or a registered user. Please read these terms of use carefully before you start to use the Site. By using the Site, you indicate that you accept these terms of use and that you agree to abide by them. If you do not agree to these terms of use, please refrain from using the Site.

Information about us

 

www.iconsultvet.co.uk is a site operated by Boehringer Ingelheim Animal Health UK Limited (“We”). We are a private limited company registered in England and Wales number 01961886 and have our registered office (and main trading address) at Ellesfield Avenue, Bracknell, Berkshire RG12 8YS. We are part of the Boehringer Ingelheim Group of Companies.
